Feature.Name: Tariff Service
Feature.Description: Suggests products based on customer's yearly energy consumption

Step.Name: GIVEN the yearly energy consumption at 3500 kWh per year

StepName.Format: the yearly energy consumption at 3500 kWh per year

Step.Name: Order of product list should be ProductB and then ProductA

StepName.Format: Order of product list should be ProductB and then ProductA

Step.Name: ProductB is cheaper with an annual estimate as 800 Euro

StepName.Format: ProductB is cheaper with an annual estimate as 800 Euro

Step.Name: ProductA should have annual estimate as 830 Euro

StepName.Format: ProductA should have annual estimate as 830 Euro
